summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TripStars Phase 4 features: In-app notifications, audit logging, email service, and background scheduler. All backend APIs working correctly, frontend notification bell and audit logs page functioning properly with role-based access control.
passed_tests: All notification API endpoints (GET /notifications, GET /unread-count, POST /mark-read, POST /mark-all-read)
All audit logs API endpoints (GET /audit-logs with filters and role-based access)
Notification creation triggers for task assignment, comments, status changes
Audit log creation for task creation, status changes, comments, file uploads
Frontend notification bell with unread count badge and dropdown functionality
Frontend audit logs page with filtering and role-based access (admin/manager only)
Role-based access control - team members cannot access audit logs
Email service configuration (disabled for testing via EMAIL_ENABLED=false)
Background scheduler startup and overdue task checking
All previous Phase 1-3 features still working (no breaking changes)
